page.title: miniTermo / Arduino Termostat FAN relay on ESP-01S / DHT22
page.content:
This is minithermo, automated thermostat for wind turbine in fireplace.

Css animations of circles to indicate that the fan is on and is rotaiting.

Setting up trigger temperature is made by scrolling on circle itself.

DYI box made from PVC. 


Futures:

* ArduinoOTA
* Update values on all devices in realtime.
* DHT11 as temperture sensor.
* Outside temperature from weather API.


Case is a simple and fast deign made from PVC sheet
